title: Figure, "Man with Ewe and Lamb", 1933
markings: underside: hammer, sickle, cog hand-painted in blue overglaze
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Man dressed in colorfully-patterned native costume, holding black lamb over shoulders, striding forward with left foot, an ewe standing next to him; rectangular base.

tombstone.epitaph:
Figure, "Man with Ewe and Lamb", 1933.
1933. Porcelain, enamel, gilding. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-136.
